name: Wormhole Fixer
description:
In a dreamlike world, suspended between time and space, you are the only thing that stands between your own reality and the destruction of the space-time continuum. Your mission is to repair the evil wormholes, spatial-temporal breaches that connect your era with other past or future. You will have to deal with dinosaurs, aliens from the future and medieval spreaders. How can you face them? You have to repair the wormholes, by filling them with all the objects you have at your disposal!
But be careful: choose wisely which objects to throw into them... otherwise you could be the one who breaks space-time!

A game that will keep you in suspense, full of twists and anachronistic objects.

Maybe this was not the game you wanted, but it was certainly the one you needed.
